description: You walk through the dungeon, a dark place tainted by evil in-tent. You stare at the mysterious dark splatters on the stone and smell the copper and iron in the air.
The room is large and rectangular with a giant stone staircase that spirals down into the darkness.
The room is made out of strange looking stone. There is a single well in the center of it.
